On the 24 Feb, Ukrainians woke up to the sound of explosions. Russia has announced a full-scale war. From that time on, the lives of Ukrainians are in danger. Russian troops are bombing and shelling numerous Ukrainian cities, towns and villages right now. They destroy our homes, shell kindergarten and orphanages. Many people can't leave bomb shelters because of constant attacks, and women give birth right there. 
Now, the Ukrainian army fights back to defend our country. Men and women join the ranks of volunteers to protect their hometowns and loved ones. Civilians unite to help each other and counteract Russia's fake news. Now, we are strong and united! And now more than ever, we need your help! Support the Ukrainian army to defend Ukraine and the world's peace!

You can help rescue bears like Clara.
She was found in a tiny, dirty cage in a restaurant car park surrounded by piles of rubbish, noise and car fumes.

Thankfully she was rescued and brought home to our sanctuary in Vietnam. Clara is now safe and no one will ever hurt her again.
Will you donate today to bring every last bile bear home?

Today is #GivingTuesday. There is no greater gift than the gift of health!
We see how healthcare in low-income countries is under even more pressure due to the current pandemic. More than ever, well-trained health professionals are needed. With KIT Scholarship Fund we support health professionals to study a Master programme in international or public health. By training health professionals at KIT, we can help reduce the shortage of health workers in low-income countries and enable these professionals to make a difference in their own country. Local professionals know best which approaches work in the context of their own country, allowing everyone to get access to good quality healthcare.
We would like to contribute even more by training more people, but this is only possible with your support.

If you would like to support a student in their strive for the tangible betterment of global health please visit

In Israel, LIFE and DEATH moments are being faced constantly, today, right NOW.
In the past year, there have been more emergency medical calls made than EVER before in the nation‚Äôs history!
Paramedics and emergency medical technicians MUST RESPOND to every single call for help. They must triage the injured, stop the bleeding from fatal wounds, restart hearts that have ceased to beat, evacuate critical Covid patients, and so much more.
This work cannot stop, nor can it slow. And to do it they need an overflowing stream of medical supplies and equipment. In Israel these things are provided almost exclusively by the generous donations of others, largely from FRIENDS in America.
When you make a donation of ANY AMOUNT to help provide the urgent professional medical supplies that Israelis cannot live without, we will send you one of our ISRAEL FIRST-AID KITS as a token of our appreciation.
This kit contains a variety of household first-aid supplies such as multiple types of personal bandages, gauze, tape, tweezers, alcohol prep pads, scissors, safety gloves, cotton swabs, and more.
When you give to help Israel‚Äôs emergency response teams save the most critically wounded and desperate patients, we want to give you this kit to help in the small emergencies of your life.
Please give right now. EVERY DOLLAR SAVES LIVES.
